entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
